website_summaries.verdict: Unique small electric metal shear for softer metals that does away with the typical power cord.
pros: Small frame and rechargeable battery make this shear extremely portable for on-site use
Comes with detachable cutting heads for different, softer materials

customer_reviews.title: Cuts good. Whoever came up with the safety switch needs ...
customer_reviews.text: Cuts good. Whoever came up with the safety switch needs to go back to the drawing board. My wife could not use them and it was difficult for me. (There is nothing physically wrong with either of us) I took them apart and threw the safety switch in trash. They work great now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: One battery bad...need company to send me a replacement battery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received unit and there was one bad battery. I sent a dissatisfied review of product and the company immediately reach out to me to correct the problem. The Company sent me a completely new Hi-Spec 3.6V Multi-Cutter. I re-decked a pontoon boat and used the scissor to trim the new carpeting....the scissor worked great....extremely satisfied with the scissor and the attention to my concerns, with the replacement scissor package being sent to me quickly....Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Choppy inside cuts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use for sewing it is great for straight cuts and outside curve's not so much for inside curve cuts is makes them choppy
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Laye

customer_reviews.title: A must have item for cutting up lots of Amazon boxes on trash day! Easy to start.
customer_reviews.text: I love these elctric scissors!. No more sore hands from tearing apart boxes on trash day. I saw some reviews that mentioned that it was hard for them to hold in the button in order to start the scissors, well this must have been fixed as I have no issues what so ever and can fill up an entire recycle bin with cutup boxes in one sitting and with just one of the 2 batteries provided. I consider this a must have item. I can now fit much more in my recycle bin. Cuts thicker boxes as well that contained TV's and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: mcasao

customer_reviews.title: help me with my arthritic hands
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help me with my arthritic hands, using scissors was very painful, and using the knife was dangerous. I began to look through the various battery-operated scissors and came across these Hi-Spec 3.6 V electric scissors and read the narrative about the various uses. They fit the bill, after they arrived I used them to cut boxes, trim my rose bushes of blooms that had died; and other various things such as tarps and heavy cardboard boxes with ease. Would highly recommend these scissors and read the accompanying literature on how to use the various blades.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Ya gets what ya pays for. Getting the thing to keep cutting means grabbing the trigger with a death grip and even then it won't stay on continuously. It's a cheap piece of junk that sort of does the job. If I ever need to do more cutting again, I'll probably look for a better, more robust model.
customer_reviews.author: Rivegauche610

customer_reviews.title: Too loud-Not for sewing
customer_reviews.text: I sew a lot and sometimes late at night and was looking forward to receiving this. It performs well but too darn loud---!!! If you think you won't disturb anyone after midnight think again. It sounds like hair clippers but 5 times louder! Real bummer for me. I am not able to use them because I just cannot tolerate the noise. Only keeping it because it makes an excellent box cutter in preparation for the recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: DoTell

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Black and Decker power scissors a few years back and while their initial use was fine they were a pain to make sure you had it charged up and after one Christmas wrapping season they became very hard to use and we just finally gave up on it. purchased the Hi-Spec 3.6 electric scissors with the extra battery and all I can say is" Holy Cow" are these scissors great. Far superior to the Black and Decker scissors
customer_reviews.author: rabid book reader

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well, but is difficult to hold.
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful tool, but has an unfortunate flaw... the safety switch is very difficult to press down, while simultaneously pulling the ON trigger. This is, for me, not a trivial matter. It is quite difficult to use. I have owned other battery powered scissors that were very easy to use, so I fail to see why this one was designed in a way that requires a great deal of strength and agility.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, if you have the grip of a gorilla
customer_reviews.text: Cuts fine. Just requires too much effort to hold the switch and safety lever to use. Wife couldn't operate the scissors at all. When I came home from work, she would have me cut the next day's cloth out because she couldn't make it work. Too much hand pressure needed.
customer_reviews.author: frosty

customer_reviews.title: Hard for my wife to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted to use them for her crafts and does from time to time, but they are a little big for her hand while having to keep the trigger button held down. She was hoping for an on-button. They do cut very well though. I use them to open those tough Amazon manilla envelopes and large bags of dog food and it goes right through them.
customer_reviews.author: WynBrks

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!! Once the blades go dull you will not be able to buy replacement blades!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I gave these scissors a 5-star rating because they cut great but once I used up the blades that came with the scissors I couldn't buy any replacement blades. I wrote support asking where could I buy replacement blades and they told me that they are simply unavailable. I also wrote the manufacturer and they told me they do not sell replacement blades and that I would need to buy new scissors. So now I'm stuck with pair of scissors that have become completely useless due to unavailable replacement blades. Even though initially I liked them I no longer can use them!
customer_reviews.author: slavan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: As cheap in material and workmanship as you can possibly imagine. I bought this to help alleviate arthritis in my hands and shoulders when cutting up materials for recycling. But you have to press so hard on the trigger it’s obscene. Extremely difficult to keep this thing going for more than a few seconds. I spent the extra money and bought a more expensive model, and it made a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bitofinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This updates my earlier review in which I found the product difficult to operate and thus returned it. Seller promptly contacted me to advise that the instructions were not clear and that I simply needed to hold down the disengage button and power the scissors, then release the disengage button. Not necessary to continue to depress the disengage as I did before which is what made it hard to operate. They sent me a complimentary replacement and following their advice I find the unit very easy to use. It’s an excellent product. Great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: mike h.

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for lefties
customer_reviews.text: There is a safety button on the left side of these elec scissors which has to be pressed at the same time that you initially ‘pull the trigger’. This is awkward for right handed people but pretty much impossible for lefties. Wish it noted that in the description. On a positive note, I initially had a battery issue, before discovering the safety button, and in contacting the company they were extremely responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Dubsee

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is very hard to use. There is a safety button that must be pressed at the same time as the trigger. The button location is not within a normal grasp of the sissors. Trying to hold the two buttons down at once is awkard, strains the hands and fingers and leads to slippage of the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: largeamountsofbullshit

customer_reviews.title: #FAIL - VERY Disappointed!!! Safety button 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I sure wish I would of read the reviews before purchasing! The safety button... #FAIL. My hand starts to cramp trying to hold it let alone I guess my strength is as good as it use to be.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: The safety switch renders the device useless. The trigger requires a vice grip to use. I strained my wrist and forearm within 30 min of trying to use this. These problems have been documented in other reviews. I secured the safety switch in the "on" position (using hot glue gun) and made it tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: thor

customer_reviews.title: Bypassed the safety switch.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this tool 4 stars because of the difficult to use safety switch. The tool was very easy to use after I bypassed the safety switch. It is very useful when softwood cutting Amazon boxes into smaller pieces. Not a bad tool for 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: These scissors are great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these scissors for about a month now, and they work great. I'm using them to cut chopped strand fiberglass, and it makes the job much easier than manual scissors. You can cut with greater control, and at least ten times faster than manual scissors. For function, I'd give it five stars. There was a problem with one of the batteries arriving dead. However, the seller took care of that immediately, so I would give them five stars for customer service. Total stars: ten stars. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Harland

customer_reviews.title: Cuts .30 magnet like butter!
customer_reviews.text: I'm turning some artwork on 4"x4" canvas into magnets. It's been pretty easy with this handy tool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stidham

customer_reviews.title: Effortless cutting
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through heavy felted wool sweaters. The safety is difficult to depress. I ended up securing it in the ‘start’ position so just squeezing the trigger activates the cutting blades. If we had kids at home I would not do this. Would have given 5 stars but for the safety switch design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hi-Spec Electric Scissors Works For Me!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any complaints it works great! I use it for cutting leather It zips through nicely, and I like having the extra battery so I don't have to wait for a battery recharge, or use manual scissors. Also the price for me, was right. I strongly recommend Hi-Spec Electric Scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Jaysways

customer_reviews.title: Safety switch makes it unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Many people that buy this product are too disabled to use regular scissors and like me, they purchased this item as a medical helper. However it is not possible to operate the safety switch and the on-off trigger simultaneously. Even though it will void the warranty, I disassembled the scissors and removed the safety switch. Now it's usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric Scissors, Hi-Spec DT30325, 3.6V Multi Cutter Set
customer_reviews.text: Electric Scissors, Hi-Spec DT30325, 3.6V Multi Cutter Set with... SKU:DT30325-US This shipment was sent to: Joseph B Snider 4 OAKBROOK LN MINERAL WELLS, WV 26150-9406 United States v3p8pcjl4mzr65g@marketplace.amazon.com Delivered Tuesday, 9/3/19 Checked batterys and no movement in sizzors. Plugged one in and light on charger stayed on for about twenty minutes. Left in charger for five hours and made the sissors move but not enough power to cut paper. Installed next battery and no light
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Snider

customer_reviews.title: What a powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a specific purpose, cutting indoor outdoor carpet and wow did it work. The battery life was great and having two to work with made it even better. Had to cut a 10x20 piece into 4 inch strips. Completed the job in short work. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Viers

customer_reviews.title: works well once it is started
customer_reviews.text: It is a little challenging getting it started, pushing the safety button and the starter button at the same time, yet once this is accomplished it works very well. We used it on some lawn/turf carpeting and have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kfallsgal

customer_reviews.title: hi-spec multi-cutter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut denim and other heavy cloth. It cuts very well using the lighter duty blade. Very easy to use - put away the scissors. Extra battery pack is a plus. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Spender

customer_reviews.title: electric scissors
customer_reviews.text: This product is mediocre at best. The scissors are awkward to handle and the safety button must be pressed the same time as the start button. Once the safety buttons are released and the power button is pressed to begin cutting, the scissors do no continue to cut; they stop and start before the wrapping is finished. Once the scissors stop, I had to repeat the entire process. It would take much less time to use normal scissors. I was not impressed with this brand and certainly will not suggest purchasing these electric scissors!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Steffen

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: These electric scissors work fine. The only complaint is they are a little awkward to use, but I think it is because of the safety features on it. There is a bit of a learning curve to figure out how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: M White

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite tools!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are great especially for use with wrapping paper. Zip, and you have a nice straight cut. We also use them for cutting card board, plastic sheets, and lots of other things..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thick fiberglass with ease
customer_reviews.text: Love it, comes with two batteries but I have yet to need the second charge. Zip thru 18 oz fiberglass mat like butter ... try that with shears. Not lending these out, don't even ask.
customer_reviews.author: dls

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard-to-cut fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This will be great for hard-to-cut fabrics. There will be a learning curve for me to be accurate with it, but I expected that. It appears and feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Merry

customer_reviews.title: Difficult and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these scissors to help me cut mesh for wreaths. As with others the safety buttons were a waiste of time and cramped my hands trying to push the buttons and start the scissors. If I hadn’t thrown the box away it would have been sent back pronto.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: Love these scissors.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are very handy. Light weight and the rechargable batteries work well. Only thing I can say I would improve on is the position of the safety button.
customer_reviews.author: paintinkate

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to press the power and safety switch at the same time. Otherwise, great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I never had a set of electric scissors before, they are unbelievable! They cut like mad men. I originally intended to use this just for fiberglass but now I'm using it for everything. Cardboard, paper, you name it it cuts it and it doesn't fast!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nick V

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy cutting
customer_reviews.text: Works great, small hands need both hands one to depress safety button while pressing trigger. Bigger hands can use one hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, after I received and tried out the product, I don't know what negative reviews were complaining about. For $25 bucks, you got an electric scissors with TWO removable batteries. It cuts through cardboard easily, and also easily to operate, not as some negative reviews were complaining that made me a bit worry when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item, clearly beats the old scissors for cutting. Easy to use, and lightweight. Would be nice if there was a better way to control the locking system on it. Overall it's a thumbs up..
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B.

customer_reviews.title: Shut off switch had to be defeated/removed to use
customer_reviews.text: The center switch which I assume works like a safety would not engage and so had to be held in place awkwardly to operate the trigger for the cutters. However it was easy enough to remove a handful of screws and remove the sliding switch and re-assemble. It operates without issue and is good enough for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great to cut out curves!
customer_reviews.text: You need to push 2 buttons to work but other than that it's great, the screws are starting to loosen but tighting them seems to help a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: Safety first.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what I needed to cut up cardboard for recycling. Lots of power, easy to control, and so much safer than the razor sharp utility knife. Very well made, and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It cut through 4 layers of thick wool like butter
customer_reviews.text: I braid wool rugs - my hands get awful sore from cutting thick pieces of wool - just got this today - started it up right out of the box and it cut through 4 thick layers of wool fabric like butter - this is a fabulous tool - no wrestling with it (I'm a lefty) no hassles, just a good working tool.
customer_reviews.author: Cyellis

customer_reviews.title: Sure saves old arthritis hands!!
customer_reviews.text: First time with electric scissors but still have all my fingers!! Still learning but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great product that cuts fast and battery lasts!
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent value. They come with two cutting heads and two rechargeable LI batteries. One cutting head is for paper, one is for heavier material. I mostly cut a lightweight material. It also does a decent job on cardboard. It is amazing how long they run on a single charge!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Meaningless security lock
customer_reviews.text: The tool has a security lock which is mandatory for operation. It is very difficult to push both the security lock and trigger simultaneously. 2 hands are demanded for using it. There are many other cutting tools around which don't demand a secondary security lock. For maker: Remove the security lock. It is meaningless and makes working very difficult with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Vardges Melkonyan

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these scissors, they make projects so much easier. The cutting ease and accuracy are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to use because you have to squeeze two buttons at the same time with one hand. And you have to squeeze it so hard that it's difficult to cut a straight line.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery.
customer_reviews.text: The good was it cut cardboard. The bad is a defective battery and a buzzing charger that fails to charge. I really wanted to like this with the lithum battery but the two defects in one package is very concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Say again

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be very difficult to use. You have to press a safety button with one finger while pressing the on button with another. I understand the logic of the safety button, but it's ill placed and 90% of the time the on button fails to operate the scissors. It's awkwardly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality cutting - They promised send me a replacement blade BUT STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality cutting - They promised send me a replacement blade BUT STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED IT WILL NOT ORDER FROM THEM AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Vickey S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Great Service
customer_reviews.text: My scissors came with two of the same blade. They quickly replaced the missing blade. They work well,
customer_reviews.author: ETCarGuy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Even with the battery packs fully charged, the scissors stopped working after to brief uses. The safety switch seems to be blocking the on switch.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service excellant
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the battery powered scissors and had charging issues with first contacted customer service and they replaced the complete unit which worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to operate.
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to operate. To press on one side and hold it and the keep it straight to cut fabric. They are great to open packages. But for me are very hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: IrGoGo

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great price and what I am using this for is on cutting fiberglass works great without needing scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: sheers
customer_reviews.text: they work wonderfully, the handle is a little large and the buton to operate the blades is awkard
customer_reviews.author: seg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to cut FRP .090 thick. However, the E blade needed to cut it is not included.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality/Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect, it really helped speed the process of cutting all the materials I had.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: I understand the safety switch but it makes it hard to use
customer_reviews.author: JAMES HACKETT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cut
customer_reviews.text: Great cut and love not having a cord. It is a bit large for my small hands but was able to get used to it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: havingfun

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to use once you figure it out. I think they were a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased electric scissors before but this pair is really loud. I guess I have to get ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnybee

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Tried to charge the batteries and no charge is going to the dock the plug is hot but not charging, very disappointed. I tried both batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a work horse. It has cut everything within reason. Even double walled cardboard box’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used the electric scissors to cut into pieces a heavy semi truck tarp (25 ft x 40 ft) for disposal. When laid flat the tool made long cuts in a couple minutes without taxing the fingers. No noticeable drawn of the battery. One of my best purchases this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does  not cut fabric
customer_reviews.text: After 2 week both blades became dull when cutting fabric..It works well for cutting paper
customer_reviews.author: Hoser dozen

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to last.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scissors replaced two times already and still haven't had one make it more than a couple of uses before it stops working. Would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kohn

customer_reviews.title: replacement for Black and Decker
customer_reviews.text: worked great, was a great replacement for older obsolete Black and Decker, and comes with 2 batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowrick

customer_reviews.title: big,heavy and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: this product is difficult to operate.you need two hands to start it.DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: JamesWilliamLaurence

customer_reviews.title: Returned it!
customer_reviews.text: Could not operate these scissors. The way the on button is set up to be pressed at the same time as the trigger is very difficult for arthritis hands. I sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Winni Lipstreu

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is difficult to use. Have to contort your hand and fingers to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: V. Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Like this item but hard on small hands
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the fact you have to reset the safety button every time u stop. Having small hands , you have to use both hands to get it started again.
customer_reviews.author: sebrena andrews-dockery

customer_reviews.title: Would not work. Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: When you buy something. You expect it to work. It seems amazon has become a place, where companies are able to ship poor quality products. Two different items delivered the same day both do not work!
customer_reviews.author: willard eckert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t force them to cut
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for what I need them for, my job contains cutting Kydex all the time a material plastic it works fine on it
customer_reviews.author: James Torrence

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is cutting old jeans for a quilt. They cut through like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Fiberglass Cloth
customer_reviews.text: The electric scissors worked well to cut 1708 fiberglass cloth to required patterns. Clean continuous cuts around free form shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Z

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to start !
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to operate! Was not worth the money! It cut well once you got it going but it was very difficult to get it started!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda  M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Deal
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Doesn't give one a place to order replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Price

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through thick cardboard fast.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Cut up a lot of cardboard However, one of the batteries will not charge. Chg light not on right out of box. Can it be exchanged for another?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and returned as charger would not recharge. Replacement was also defective and would not cut with continuous power. Tossed in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: martinsoft

customer_reviews.title: Very good device
customer_reviews.text: Small thing to make better would be a switch to turn on and continued run but good even though you have to hold button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really cuts!!!
customer_reviews.text: love the different heads, a bit hard to change the heads, need to read directions again, I wish the directions would have had more instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before i bought. Alot about safty switch which truly so easy my 5 year old could use it. I had a fiberglass project and it worked perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would cut FRP but not nearly powerful enough. Best use on cloth i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy went to cut plastic laminate did not cut at all would be better with a utility knife. Just looking to do rough cuts without setting up trim router
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Am returning the product since it does not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn82

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use with the safety button
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to press both the safety button and trigger at the same time. So much so, that I actually took the thing apart and removed the safety completely. After that it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Can depend on
customer_reviews.text: I am told it is a very good brand and the price is great. It works very well. My husband used it and really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Borriello

customer_reviews.title: ... this product with the wrong charger rendering it completely useless. not only that
customer_reviews.text: received this product with the wrong charger rendering it completely useless. not only that, it started smoking when i plugged it i with the charger provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ullman

customer_reviews.title: The Wife loves it. She uses it pracitically every day.
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses it for a hobby. The only reason I gave it 4 overall is the noise it creates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety button makes use impossible
customer_reviews.text: Although the blades cut well the safety is a JOKE! My hand was cramping trying to make it work. This product needs redesigned to be useable.
customer_reviews.author: patrick dotson

customer_reviews.title: to big
customer_reviews.text: cuts well just to big & harder to handle than reg scissors
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and found it to be set up poorly. My wife has small hands and it is impossible for her to use it the way it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use this product. Insstructions are very vague and not complete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Blades dulled fast! Doesn’t have much power but cuts my fabric alright
customer_reviews.author: Blake swartz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, although difficult for my elderly mom to use due to safety button.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not good for working with a fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Both the safety switch and on/off button are too far apart for a Woman’s hand to depress at the same time to work!
customer_reviews.author: a calderwood

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use scissors.
customer_reviews.text: I like my scissors, but just one problem. I can't hold down the button and cut at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: linda

product_meta.title: Hi-Spec 3.6V Electric Scissors with Release Safety Switch & Extra Battery and 2 x Cutting Blades. Up to 70 Minutes Continuous Cutting
feature_bullets: SAFE & SIMPLE TO USE: Three Steps * 1. Press the Safety Lock Button * 2. Press the large trigger * Release the Safety Lock Button

MULTI-CUTTERS - ALL CUTTING NEEDS: These electric power scissors are the ideal tool for cutting all kinds of materials including: Canvas, Carpets, Cardboard, Corrugate, Denim, Fabrics, Leather, Plastics, Tarps, Wallpaper, Vinyl and other thin materials including light tin and aluminum foil (full list in contents)

LITHIUM-ION TECHNOLOGY: Compact, lightweight and useful! With two batteries and a wall mains charger it's always ready to go. The 1300mAh Lithium-Ion battery produces enough power for upto 70 minutes of continous cutting (dependent on material type and thickness) - a fast and effective way to quickly complete cutting tasks
CUT TIME & EFFORT: These Lithium-Ion Battery battery-operated, lightweight and easy-to-use scissors are capable of cutting carpet, vinyl flooring, cardboard, fabric, light foil and more!
HI-SPEC 3-YEAR WARRANTY: All our products meet international standards of testing and are guaranteed against defects in design, material and workmanship

specifications.Included Components:
Hi-Spec Customer service:
support@hi-spec.toolsContents

♦ Cordless Power Cutters
- 10,000RPM - UL Approved 2-Pin Plug

♦ 2 x 1300mAh Lithium Ion Batteries
Charge one while using the other

♦ 2 x Scissor Head Blades:
> "C" Embossed Scissor Head Blades for cutting flexible softer materials:
- Cotton Fabric up to 2.5mm
- Felt up to 6mm
- Leather up to 3.5mm
- Carpet Backing up to 3.5mm
- Vinyl Floor Covering up to 3.5mm
- Corrugated Cardboard up to 5mm
- Solid Cardboard up to 1.8mm
- Rose Stems up to 3mm

> "E" Embossed Scissor Head Blades for cutting tougher harder materials:
- Vinyl Floor Covering up to 3.5mm
- Corrugated Cardboard up to 5mm
- Solid Cardboard up to 1.8mm
- Plastic Straps up to 1.5mm
- Plastic Sheets
